Hello world!
Disabled / Deafblind
Areas of Law
Organizations and Lawyers
Organizations and Lawyers
The Chicago Bar Foundation and the Motorola Mobility are working together to connect people to free or low cost legal assistance in and around Chicago.

Click on the "FIND HELP" button above to see a list of legal assistance available to you by specialty. Scroll down the list and click on the appropriate category to see a listing of the organizations and lawyers that are available to represent you.
MainInstr
Speech Disabled or Deafblind? CLICK HERE:
If you speak Spanish, CLICK HERE:
Si usted habla español, haga CLIC AQUI:
Contact us: The Chicago Bar Foundation - 321 S Plymouth Ct, Ste 3B, Chicago, IL 60604, 312.554.1204
If you are deaf, hard-of-hearing, speech-disabled, or deafblind...

You may contact the organizations and lawyers listed in here through a Telecommunications Relay Service (TRS). 
 
 This is a free operator assisted service that allows you to place calls to a standard voice telephone by using a keyboard or assistive device like a cell phone. 
 
 To place a TRS call from a standard voice phone, dial 711 to be automatically connected to a TRS operator.
BEFORE you start your search, YOU need to know that you will need to call first and make an appointment, as most of the legal aid programs listed do not accept walk-ins.
Scroll through the list to find the area of law you need.
If you are Spanish speaking...
Si usted es de habla española ...
You can call CARPLS at 312.738.9200 or go online to www.AyudaLegallL.org
Usted puede llamar al CARPLS 312.738.9200 o visite el sitio www.AyudaLegallL.org
